name: SGEL: Birds Aren't Real!
description:
Birds are being hunted by the Military for being "Not Real"! Protect these feathery friends from expensive Military eqiupment using a multitude of weapons and upgrades!

With 4 different bird types, unlock unlimited potential for the most powerful flock you could ever create.

Ps. Tbh, I sorta agree with the military here. I have the perfect evidence as well!

Birds have Legs. 

Legs spelled backwards is Sgel

 S-Government

 G-Drones

 E-Are 

L-Real

Beat THAT, science!
